column4: hello, i am trying to install java and i am unsure how to do it. it says to type "su" into the console and then enter the root password, but i do not know what the root password is. i tried my personal account password, but that did not work. any suggestions? thank you.
default ubuntu install doesn't have root password, i think
you need to set it first
ubuntu uses normally sudo, but sun java install requires su
